document.full_text: as part of a midlife crisis last april, bob eckstein embarked on a tour of new york city's table tennis haunts, seeking to build street cred and finally master the game.
document.title: weathering a midlife crisis in the haunts of table tennis
lines_and_colors: as part of a midlife crisis last april, bob eckstein embarked on a tour of new york city's table tennis haunts, seeking to build street cred and finally master the game.
